mapper.select: select c.*,b.bank_name from bank b inner join (select * from custom where custom_block < 10 order by custom_date desc) c on b.bank_code = c.bank_code order by custom_date desc limit #{page},10
select count(room_code) as room_count from room where custom_id = #{custom_id}
mapper.update: update custom set custom_block = #{custom_block} where custom_id=#{custom_id}
